import { Component } from "react" import { Button, Form, Col, Row } from "react-bootstrap" import { connect } from "react-redux" import { withRouter } from "react-router-dom" import { mapDispatchToProps, mapStateToProps } from "../../app/functions" import { Props, UserData as State } from '../../interface/Interfaces' class InputKtp extends Component { man: string = 'LAKI-LAKI' woman: string = 'PEREMPUAN' constructor(props: Props){ super(props) this.state = {} } eventHendler = (e: any) => { console.log(e.target.value) this.setState({ gender: e.target.value }) } render = () => { return( <>

 ) } } export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(InputKtp))
